name: FormAI
content:
Company FAQ Dataset
Q1: How can I reset my password?
A1: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. You'll receive an
email with instructions to create a new password.
Q2: What should I do if I didn't receive the password reset email?
A2: Please check your spam/junk folder first. If it's not there, wait a few minutes and try again. If the
issue persists, contact support via support@example.com.
Q3: How do I update my billing information?
A3: Navigate to your account settings and select the 'Billing' tab. There you can update your credit
card or payment method details.
Q4: Where can I download my invoice or billing statements?
A4: Invoices and billing statements can be found under 'Billing History' in your account settings. You
can download them in PDF format.
Q5: Do you offer refunds?
A5: We offer refunds on a case-by-case basis within 14 days of purchase. Please contact support
with your order ID and reason for the refund request.
Q6: Can I change my subscription plan?
A6: Yes, you can change your plan at any time from the 'Subscription' section in your account. The
changes will take effect immediately or at the next billing cycle depending on the plan.
Q7: Is there a free trial available?
A7: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card is required to start
the trial.
Q8: How do I delete my account permanently?
A8: To delete your account, go to 'Account Settings' > 'Security' > 'Delete Account'. This action is
irreversible and will remove all your data.
Q9: Is my data secure with your service?
A9: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and follow best practices in data security to ensure
your information is safe and private.
Q10: How can I contact customer support?
A10: You can reach out to us through the live chat on our website, via email at
support@example.com, or by submitting a ticket in the Help Center.

name: Subscription Plans
content: We offer three subscription tiers: Basic ($9.99/month), Pro ($19.99/month), and Enterprise ($49.99/month). You can change your subscription at any time through your account dashboard. Changes take effect at the start of the next billing cycle.
